location_history.map: function (doc, meta) {if( doc.lhistid && doc.obid) emit([doc.obid], {"id":doc.lhistid, "obid":doc.obid, "dvid":doc.dvid,"building": doc.buid,"floor":doc.floor, "lat":doc.coordinates_lat, "long":doc.coordinates_lon,"timestamp":doc.timestamp}); }

location_history_by_time.map: function (doc, meta) {if( doc.lhistid && doc.obid) emit([doc.obid, doc.timestamp], {"id":doc.lhistid, "obid":doc.obid, "dvid":doc.dvid,"building": doc.buid,"floor":doc.floor, "lat":doc.coordinates_lat, "long":doc.coordinates_lon,"timestamp":doc.timestamp}); }

location_history_obj_cat.map: function (doc, meta) {if( doc.lhistid && doc.objcat) emit(doc.objcat, doc.obid); }
location_history_obj_cat.reduce: function reduce(key, values, rereduce) {var merged = [].concat.apply([], values);  return merged;}
